com.epoch.courseware

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.courseware.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CourseConstants

    public final class Course
extends Object
implements CourseConstants
    An ACE course.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int aceBookId
      When not zero, ID number of the ACE online textbook associated with this course.
      private boolean amCoinstructor
      When this course is one of the courses of an instructor, indicates whether the instructor is really a coinstructor.
      private String book
      Textbook of this course.
      private String description
      Description of the course.
      private Date enableDate
      Date at which course is enabled.
      private int flags
      Flags of this course.
      private String homePage
      Home page of the course at instructor's institution.
      private int id
      Unique ID of the course.
      private String maxExtensionsStr
      Maximum length of extensions across the course; can be overriden by instructor.
      private String name
      Name of the course.
      private String notes
      Notes to display to the student; easily edited by instructor.
      private String ownerId
      Login ID of the owner of this course.
      private byte[] passwordHash
      Hashed password of this course; may be empty.
      private TimeZone timeZone
      Time zone of the instructor's institution.

        public void letUsersSeeSynthCalcdProds()
                                throws DBException

      • isOkIPAddress

        public boolean isOkIPAddress(String ipAddr,
                             User user)
        Gets whether a student's IP address matches one of the allowed IP addresses. If the allowed IP address has four numbers, the student's IP address must match it exactly; if it has fewer, the student's IP address must merely begin with it; if it contains a / character, it is sent to the class IpSubnet, which interprets it as a classful or classless range of routing numbers.
        Parameters:
        ipAddr - a student's IP address
        user - the user
        Returns:
        true if this course does not check IP addresses, or if there are no allowed IP addresses listed, or if the student's IP address matches one of the allowed IP addresses

      • hasForumTopics

        public boolean hasForumTopics()
                       throws DBException
        Gets whether this course has any topics posted on the forum
        Returns:
        true if this course has any topics posted on the forum
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
